title: Mandhaara Lyrics Bhaagamathie
stanzas:
<div>
Mandhaaraa Lyrics Bhaagamathie

Mandhaaraa mandhaara
mayilaadum mandaaraa
madalodu thooral thanthaaraa

Mandhaaraa mandhaara
kuralodhum mandaaraa
kuralilyeri kadhalil sendraaraa

kilaiyinil thaavum kaagam
ilaiyinai neeril podum
adhai ariyaamal odum
nilai unarvaayaa

unai ariyaamal neeyum
ival man odai mele
oru ilai veesi ponaalum
padarvaayaa

hoo
pollaadha megam pookkum
ennodu porida paarkum

ini ennaagumo
malar mannaagumo
adhai yaendhikolvaayaa

mandhaaraa mandhaara
manadhil aadum mandhaaraa
madalin mele thooral
thanthaaraa

Mandhaaraa mandhaara
kuralodhum mandaaraa
kuralilyeri kadhalil sendraaraa

mandhaaraa
sendraaraa
kallaaraa
ringaaraaa

Mandhaaraa mandhaara
mayilaadum mandaaraa
madalodu thooral thanthaaraa

vitha vithamaaga
poigalai alli
manadhini poosi
maraithene

nijangalai kaattum
vilambaramaaga
sirippinai idhazhil
inaithaene

unai vandhu serum aasai
uyirini yerum osai
mudhal mudhalaaga ketten
unai adaivenaa

pennodu yeno modhal
undaakkuthe un kadhal
nee thinam tharum
kalavaram kalaikkamal
nindrenaa

mandhaaraa mandhaara
manadhil aadum mandhaaraa
madalin mele thooral
thanthaaraa

Mandhaaraa mandhaara
kuralodhum mandaaraa
kuralilyeri kadhalil sendraaraa

mandhaaraa
sendraaraa
kallaaraa
ringaaraaa

Mandhaaraa mandhaara
mayilaadum mandaaraa
madalodu thooral thanthaaraa

seo.title: Mandhaara Lyrics Bhaagamathie
seo.description: Get the complete Mandhaara Lyrics Bhaagamathie from Bhaagamathie. Read the lyrics penned by Vivek and composed by Thaman S and sung by Jyotsna Radhakrishnan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vivek, Bhaagamathie, Thaman S, Jyotsna Radhakrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
